page.title: 07METHODIST CHAPEL.
page.content: The Methodist{CHAPEL}was opened in 1894 to spread the Gospel and still does so today. The small number of members are very loyal. The combined{SUNDAY SCHOOL}has over twenty children who are keen to compete with other Sunday Schools in the Thetford circuit for the Annual Youth Festival and there is a Sunday SchooL{ANNIVERSARY}each year. Each week there is a joint bible study evening with Hopton, usually taken by the Thetford Minister. Sunday services are usually taken by local preachers, the Minister visiting about once a month. There are very good relations with the Parish Church with regular, {COMBINED SERVICES.}The Anglican Church also uses the Methodist schoolroom for a weekly choir practice. Social occasions such as coffee mornings are well supported by the village people.
